name: Party Games: Kings Cup
description:
Hic... Getting drunk has never been so much hic... fun

WHAT IS KINGS CUP?
Kings Cup is a drinking game for all your iOS devices. Each card represents an action you must perform.

Watch out for the King though, if you get a King you must pour some of your drink into the 'Kings Cup'. Get the final King and you must drink the contents of the cup!

FEATURES
- 14 Unique actions!
- Gorgeous retina graphics for both iPhone and iPad
- Play with as many friends as you like

COMING SOON
- More languages

Any comments, problems or feature requests tweet us at http://twitter.com/tapboxltd
